title: Garlic Steak
directions: Cut each garlic clove into four slivers. Make four slits in the side of each steak with a sharp boning or paring knife, cutting through side edge of steak to the center; push a garlic sliver into each slit.
Place steaks on cooking grate. Cook on first side. Turn and cook to desired doneness according to time indicated in below chart.
Rare: Grill 4 minutes per side; Medium: Grill 7 to 8 minutes per side; Well-done: Grill 9 minutes per side.
ingredients: 2 beef steaks, of your choice (1.5 to 2 inches thick)
